content.prompt: Which of the following actions is most likely to be effective in reducing the digital divide at a local level?

choices.label: Creating an application that offers coupons and discounts for local businesses
Offering a discount to utility customers who pay their bills online instead of by mail
Providing free community access to computers at schools, libraries, and community centers
Requiring applicants for local government jobs to complete an online application

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
